title: Google Sheets API Batch Update Operation Response Schema
description: Schema representing the output of the Batch Update operation in Google Sheets API

payload.description: The response when updating a range of values in a spreadsheet.

responses.description: One UpdateValuesResponse per requested range, in the same order as the requests appeared.

spreadsheetId.description: The spreadsheet the updates were applied to.

totalUpdatedCells.description: The total number of cells updated.

totalUpdatedColumns.description: The total number of columns where at least one cell in the column was updated.

totalUpdatedRows.description: The total number of rows where at least one cell in the row was updated.

totalUpdatedSheets.description: The total number of sheets where at least one cell in the sheet was updated.

statusCode.description: HTTP status code of the API response.

headers.description: HTTP headers of the API response.
